Question: ganiga innovation srl CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ganiga Innovation Srl

HOOOLY Smart Bin

- Equipped with advanced AI technology for automatic waste differentiation
- Records detailed data on waste composition for personalized disposal habits
- Promotes environmental sustainability and reduces operational costs and CO2 emissions
- Two main variants: HOOOLY Indoor/Outdoor for commercial use and HOOOLY HOME for household use
- Seamless integration with smart home environments
- Recognizes and differentiates waste, notifies emptying officer, and plans optimized collection routes
- CEO Nicolas Lorenzo Zeoli and Business Development Michele Cesario to showcase at CES 2024
